body_html:
Fixed the TensorSliceReaderCache one. The other one is necessary; the code is

if (!result) delete[] buffer;

delete[] is not smart enough to not delete buffer if the distinct variable result happens to be nonnull.
body:
Fixed the `TensorSliceReaderCache` one.  The other one is necessary; the code is

```
if (!result) delete[] buffer;
```

`delete[]` is not smart enough to not delete `buffer` if the distinct variable `result` happens to be nonnull.
